verses.t: And he said{H559} unto Moses{H4872}, Come up{H5927} Lordunto the {H3068}, thou, and Aaron{H175}, Nadab{H5070}, and Abihu{H30}, and seventy{H7657} of the elders{H2205} of Israel{H3478}; and worship{H7812} ye afar off{H7350}.
And Moses{H4872} alone shall come near{H5066} Lordthe {H3068}: but they shall not come nigh{H5066}; neither shall the people{H5971} go up{H5927} with him.

And Moses{H4872} came{H935} and told{H5608} the people{H5971} all the words{H1697} Lordof the {H3068}, and all the judgments{H4941}: and all the people{H5971} answered{H6030} with one{H259} voice{H6963}, and said{H559}, All the words{H1697} Lordwhich the {H3068} hath said{H1696} will we do{H6213}.

And Moses{H4872} wrote{H3789} all the words{H1697} Lordof the {H3068}, and rose up early{H7925} in the morning{H1242}, and builded{H1129} an altar{H4196} under the hill{H2022}, and twelve pillars{H4676}, according to the twelve{H6240} tribes{H7626} of Israel{H3478}.

And he sent{H7971} young men{H5288} of the children{H1121} of Israel{H3478}, which offered{H5927} burnt offerings{H5930}, and sacrificed{H2076} peace{H8002} offerings{H2077} of oxen{H6499} Lordunto the {H3068}.
And Moses{H4872} took{H3947} half{H2677} of the blood{H1818}, and put{H7760} it in basons{H101}; and half{H2677} of the blood{H1818} he sprinkled{H2236} on the altar{H4196}.

And he took{H3947} the book{H5612} of the covenant{H1285}, and read{H7121} in the audience{H241} of the people{H5971}: and they said{H559}, LordAll that the {H3068} hath said{H1696} will we do{H6213}, and be obedient{H8085}.

And Moses{H4872} took{H3947} the blood{H1818}, and sprinkled{H2236} it on the people{H5971}, and said{H559}, Behold the blood{H1818} of the covenant{H1285}, Lordwhich the {H3068} hath made{H3772} with you concerning all these words{H1697}.
Then went up{H5927} Moses{H4872}, and Aaron{H175}, Nadab{H5070}, and Abihu{H30}, and seventy{H7657} of the elders{H2205} of Israel{H3478}:

And they saw{H7200} the God{H430} of Israel{H3478}: and there was under his feet{H7272} as it were a paved{H3840} work{H4639} of a sapphire stone{H5601}, and as it were the body{H6106} of heaven{H8064} in his clearness{H2892}.
And upon the nobles{H678} of the children{H1121} of Israel{H3478} he laid{H7971} not his hand{H3027}: also they saw{H2372} God{H430}, and did eat{H398} and drink{H8354}.

LordAnd the {H3068} said{H559} unto Moses{H4872}, Come up{H5927} to me into the mount{H2022}, and be there: and I will give{H5414} thee tables{H3871} of stone{H68}, and a law{H8451}, and commandments{H4687} which I have written{H3789}; that thou mayest teach{H3384} them.
And Moses{H4872} rose up{H6965}, and his minister{H8334} Joshua{H3091}: and Moses{H4872} went up{H5927} into the mount{H2022} of God{H430}.

And he said{H559} unto the elders{H2205}, Tarry{H3427} ye here{H2088} for us, until we come again{H7725} unto you: and, behold, Aaron{H175} and Hur{H2354} are with you: if any{H4310} man{H1167} have any matters{H1697} to do{H1167}, let him come{H5066} unto them.
And Moses{H4872} went up{H5927} into the mount{H2022}, and a cloud{H6051} covered{H3680} the mount{H2022}.

And the glory{H3519} Lordof the {H3068} abode{H7931} upon mount{H2022} Sinai{H5514}, and the cloud{H6051} covered{H3680} it six{H8337} days{H3117}: and the seventh{H7637} day{H3117} he called{H7121} unto Moses{H4872} out of the midst{H8432} of the cloud{H6051}.
And the sight{H4758} of the glory{H3519} Lordof the {H3068} was like devouring{H398} fire{H784} on the top{H7218} of the mount{H2022} in the eyes{H5869} of the children{H1121} of Israel{H3478}.

And Moses{H4872} went{H935} into the midst{H8432} of the cloud{H6051}, and gat him up{H5927} into the mount{H2022}: and Moses{H4872} was in the mount{H2022} forty{H705} days{H3117} and forty{H705} nights{H3915}.
